name: OGGG the prehistoric mushroom tester
description:
Welcome to OGGG the prehistoric mushroom tester

You have to eat otherwise you'll die. But the fields are fraught with danger. Some mushrooms will replenish health, some will deteriorate health, some will do nothing, and others will kill you! Troubling times to be alive.

ADSW or arrow keys to move, X to eat a mushroom, Z to trample a mushroom.

This is kind of a memory game, the effects of the mushrooms is constant across plays. So the more you fail, the more you know! 

Good luck
